content: Oh, and here's the payment for your Neighbor's order. If there's anything else you need, just let me know.

content: {A沉醉闻}...Nothing beats the smoky, charred aroma of grilled and baked food. I'm sure everyone will love it! Thank you, on behalf of all the Neighbors who placed the order!
